column2: "We've finally achieved our goal, have we? At long last, our fallen comrades may rest easy."
"I cannot thank you enough. For defeating our mortal enemies, and putting an end to this war. A modern-day hero."
"Though I must also thank you for something else."
"It was you who brought Clarissa to me, the sight of which reignited my passion for weaponsmithing."
"If it weren't for that, I'd probably still be some washed-up, bitter has-been."
"Thank you for snapping some sense into this old man. I've lived a truly, truly eventful life."
"What makes you jump to that conclusion? I said nothing of the sort."
"Hahaha! That's precisely what I wanted to hear from you. Too true, this is only the beginning."
"There are still battles yet to be won. It'll be some time before I quietly live out the rest of my years."
"For one thing, I'm sure Maria has no plans to let me go for the foreseeable future."
"In fact, I'm expecting her to come running back here with a broken Labrys any moment now. Someone's got to take care of that poor weapon."
"Ah, goodness gracious. I'm not allowed to grow old and senile just yet!"
